column4: He kneels at his friend's side and rolls him over.

A bullet takes out a Hydra trooper kneeling beside an armored vehicle. Other troopers fall back toward the base as they fire at approaching soldier. Phillips' men explode armored vehicles, killing nearby troopers and clearing a path into the base.
Later, on calm waters, they kneel on their respective boards.
She kneels before SOMEONE.
He kneels close to hers, and gives her an emotional hug.
He kneels in front of her.
She kneels in front of her daughter. Outside, SOMEONE's men exit the sedan.
She kneels down to the old woman's crumpled body beside the overturned table and chair.
He kneels at the door.
Carrying the pillow, she walks to SOMEONE, kneels down beside him, and removes the ice pack from his knee.
Still kneeling, he unscrews the top from the bottle, and runs his fingers over the cold surface of the glass.
He kneels before her.
In association with Imagination Abu Dhabi, Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance. Now SOMEONE kneels before a contract.
Then shrinks to a pinpoint as we drift among two petrified monks left permanently kneeling in prayer.
The guards leave the boy kneeling before the guests who sit in six uniform sections, all wearing black robes.
Alone in the attic, kneeling across from the automaton, SOMEONE waves one hand over a deck of cards.

Now, in the supply room, SOMEONE<Stevie> kneels over a freshly dug hole with her face unmasked. She moves a tile into a trash bag lined box, gets to her feet and removes a pair of rubber gloves. SOMEONE<Stevie> picks up the box. Now, in the command truck, a stout officer listens to the radio. SOMEONE<Frazier> and the others stare at him.
Inside the studio, two students spar while the others kneel around the edges of the platform. Their instructor sits on a bench and watches. Mr. SOMEONE scans his surroundings as he and SOMEONE enter.
Now young SOMEONE walks down a dirt road lined with grimy homes. Looking right, he sees dozens of kneeling men bowing, performing Salah in the mosque's courtyard.
SOMEONE crouches before the gate with SOMEONE kneeling behind.
She kneels on the floor.
Glancing at him, SOMEONE stomps to the chair. She kneels and peeks underneath.
SOMEONE<Winstead> kneels and opens fire.
SOMEONE's friends stand. They kneel again as SOMEONE and his opponent get to their feet. SOMEONE faces the archer.
Now, they kneel at a shrine.
Now, SOMEONE hurries downstairs into a basement. He kneels in front of the brick supporting the stairs and waves his hands. A red veneer crumbles away, revealing ancient darker bricks beneath.

SOMEONE<Nicole> spots a pair of evidence boxes. One labeled, Gotti, K and the other Gotti, V. A long flat box beneath them reads handle with care. As SOMEONE<Milo> kneels, SOMEONE<Nicole> finds an outline of a shotgun printed on top.
He goes to the archway and briefly surveys the room before kneeling at the foot of the bed.
At the foot of her roommate's bed, she kneels before a mini fridge.
Later, at the apartment, she kneels on the dining table, adding photographs to rows of images organized in front of her. Other photos lie in disarray behind her.
Her mother remains kneeling before the autumn flowerbed.
The agents kneel. As the SUV rounds closer, they fire.
SOMEONE and SOMEONE continue on, pressing past a group of people kneeling around a priest. A few dozen people tread water near the propellers, which have now risen completely out of the water.
Several kneeling people grab one of the priest's hand as he holds on to a capstan or rotating shaft with his other hand.
SOMEONE and SOMEONE hold hands as they kneel beside one another.
